alert.note: Alert for Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:34PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Larimer County through 815 PM MDT... At 734 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Virginia Dale, or 28 miles southwest of Cheyenne, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Larimer County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet
